metadata.title: CVE-2024-50167 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:be2net: fix potential memory leak in be_xmit()The be_xmit() returns NETDEV_TX_OK without freeing skbin case of be_xmit_enqueue() fails, add dev_kfree_skb_any() to fix it.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
